thread.title: Lufthansa declares two emergencies within 24 hours
thread.title_full: Lufthansa declares two emergencies within 24 hours

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Lufthansa declares two emergencies within 24 hours
text:
Lufthansa LH 408 Duesseldorf- Newark emergency landing in Quebec City Lufthansa declares two emergencies within 24 hours Adv: 
Aug 08, 2015 Adv: 
Lufthansa LH404 from Frankfurt to New York that diverted to Manchester, UK yesterday because of a fire indication is returning to Frankfurt. 
The B747 aircraft was seen dumping fuel over England before landing in Manchester. 
This morning Lufthansa Airbus registration D-AIGT operating as LH 408 from Duesseldorf to Newark, NJ was diverted to Quebec City in Canada and landed safely at 10.14. The flight is scheduled to continue its journey to Newark at 18.27 with an estimated arrival at 19.42 in Newark.
